synopsis.text:
Armed with nothing but his kendo skills and a dull sword, Chris, a mid-20s college hopeful, finds his life turned upside down when his spirit is transported to the mystical realm of Byston Well. Suddenly, he's thrust into a world teetering on the brink of revolution, where he's hailed as Garzey's Wing, a legendary holy warrior destined to lead the oppressed Metomeus tribe against their tyrannical overlords.

As Chris navigates this treacherous new landscape, he must grapple with the reality that his fate is still intertwined with his earthbound self. Straddling two worlds, he must find the courage to wield his newfound power and liberate the magical realm from its cruel oppressors. Will Chris rise to the challenge and become the hero Byston Well needs, or will he succumb to the overwhelming odds stacked against him? Only time will tell as Chris embarks on this epic journey of self-discovery and redemption.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
